title: Ekko/Heimer Only Stream. Climbing to Dia.
body:
Hey, just starting my Ekko/Heimer Only Stream. I'm DonkyDong and playing LoL since S1. I main Ekko (mostly Jungle) and Heimerdinger. I play only Ekko, but when picked or banned I go my Heimer (inspired by HeisenDongNA)
If you got any improvement thoughts, just let me know.
I'm always curious about feedback, so let me know :P
Greetings
